subject: Request for Replacement Flanged Bushing for Simsonn Plus X Pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I recently purchased the Simsonn Plus X pedals, and after setting them up,
I noticed that the clutch pedal was squeaking (even after applying PTFE)
and getting stuck while being pressed. I decided to take it apart to
lubricate the bushings more thoroughly, and I discovered that the flanged
bushing — the one the spring guide rod slides through — is damaged or
defective.

I have searched for a replacement online but have been unable to find a
match.
Would it be possible for you to send me a replacement part?

Thank you for your help.

conversations.body_text: Hi FloofyWoofy,  Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address, and we’ll send you a replacement free of charge.
